title: Mexican tortilla bake
description: This all-in-one dish is so quick to make. Think Mexican lasagne using ready-made tortillas instead of sheets of pasta. Utterly delicious and very moreish!For this recipe you will need a 1.5 litre/2½ pint wide-based (preferably round), shallow ovenproof dish.
ingredients: 1 mild red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
